mapper.select: SELECT club_name FROM club WHERE club_name!='동아리연합회' ORDER BY id;
SELECT c.* FROM Club c WHERE c.id = #{id};
SELECT c.* FROM Club c JOIN User_club uC ON uC.club_id = c.id JOIN user u ON u.id = uC.user_id WHERE u.id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.id;
mapper.insert: INSERT apply_q (content, board_id, club_id, semDate_id) VALUES (#{content}, 2, #{club_id}, #{semDate_id});
mapper.select: SELECT q.* ,a.* FROM apply_q q JOIN apply_a a on a.apply_q_id = q.id and q.club_id=#{club_id} group by q.id
